Posts.EditableText:
in game, press tools > options > tick play sounds
after playing a few games with annoying sound effects, I turned it off again, lol

also, the mystery that some games did have sound while others dun have sound
was because they are of different app, for example quest 6 is different from quest 5.8,
therefore it have its sound options and I always heard sound from it
